nodes.text: Ka-Moon Kholi was a member of the Jedi Order that managed to survive Order 66 and years into the Great Jedi Purge under the reign of the Galactic Empire. Shortly after the hunt for Eeth Koth, Darth Vader and the Grand Inquisitor met at a conference in the Inquisitorius Headquarters to review a holographic list of confirmed survivors that had hidden themselves well. Kholi was part of the list, as were Coleman Kcaj, Yoda, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Oppo Rancisis, and Selrahc Eluos.

Ka-Moon Kholi is a tuckerization of Giuseppe Camuncoli's last name, penciller of Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. Kholi was first mentioned in a hologram in the 2018 canon comic book Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 19, written by Charles Soule. Matt Martin later confirmed that Kholi and Eluos, a tuckerization of Soule's full name, were actual characters in canon continuity, and not simply Easter eggs.
